message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for it. Would you consider accepting this price?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. However, I still believe the product should not exceed $120 for me. Could we possibly come to an agreement at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand your persistence, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go below $125. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer you the product for $125.
